messages.body: GBH Insights: $AAPL Could Hit $1T Valuation With Curved iPhone. https://www.barrons.com/articles/apple-could-hit-1-trillion-valuation-with-curved-iphone-1523023412

links.title: Apple Could Hit $1 Trillion Valuation With Curved iPhone
links.description: A new look to the iPhone lineup could be just the final impetus to push Apple (ticker: AAPL) past the mythical $1 trillion for market valuation. The company reportedly is developing a curved display that will be able to sense when people's fingers are near it and perform tasks without touching it, according to a Bloomberg report this week.
